Note:
- Not all security issues/patches impact the Android version
- Most security advisorises collapse many security issues into one
- If anyone wants to make a merge request that sorts the columns, it'd be much appreciated.

Useful links:
- https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/security/advisories
- https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/fenix/releases
- https://gitlab.com/divested-mobile/mull-fenix
- https://gitlab.com/divested-mobile/mull
- https://gitlab.com/fdroid/fdroiddata/-/blob/master/metadata/org.mozilla.fennec_fdroid.yml
- https://github.com/fork-maintainers/iceraven-browser
- https://gitlab.com/iode/os/apps/iodebrowser

See something wrong? Open an issue or merge request:
- https://gitlab.com/Divested-Mobile/DivestOS-Website/-/blob/master/misc/ffa-dates.txt
- https://github.com/Divested-Mobile/DivestOS-Website/blob/master/misc/ffa-dates.txt
